ygData.subject: RE: Harvester quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Follow the quest as it is given to you :P  If you have all of the items, like the scythe, knife and whatever, and you know that you need to give the scythe
ygData.messageBody:
Follow the quest as it is given to you :P If you have all of the items,
like the scythe, knife and whatever, and you know that you need to give the
scythe first to get the note, then do that, and then turn in all the other
ingredients with the note and you'll have the harvester.

The headmaster was blue to me at 30th and was decent exp as well. He could
be pulled without anyone else coming, just bring him down to the water just
to make sure.

-----Original Message-----
From: Aazen1@... [mailto:Aazen1@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 9:27 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Harvester quest


From: Aazen1@...

I know that in the beginning of this quest you need to get a shadowed
scythe.Once you turn that in you get a note asking for the additional 3
needed items.My question is, if you already know the other 3 items needed,
do
you even have to do the shadowed scythe part?Also, can someone please give
me
the approximate level of the goblin in OOT who drops the shadowed knife?

Thanks in advance!
Aazen Sy'Vex

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
